metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21363 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component: Connector/J). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.27 and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of MySQL Connectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.6 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
